original_text: But I, the Lord, brought you to a good land. It was a place where fruit grew on trees. You could eat all those good things, as well as the crops that you grew there. You came into the land that I had promised to give to you. But you spoiled it with your sins. You made it a disgusting place. But I, the Lord, brought you to a good land.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 기름진 땅에 인도하여 그것의 열매와 그것의 아름다운 것을 먹게 하였거늘 너희가 이리로 들어와서는 내 땅을 더럽히고 내 기업을 역겨운 것으로 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: But I, the Lord, brought you to a good land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나 주께서 너희를 좋은 땅으로 인도하였다.

sentences.original_text: It was a place where fruit grew on trees.
You could eat all those good things,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 모든 좋은 것들을 먹을 수 있었고,

sentences.original_text: as well as the crops that you grew there.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 너희가 재배한 작물도 먹을 수 있었다.

sentences.original_text: You came into the land that I had promised to give to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내가 너희에게 주기로 약속했던 땅에 들어왔다.

sentences.original_text: But you spoiled it with your sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 죄로 그 땅을 망쳤다.

sentences.original_text: You made it a disgusting place.
But I, the Lord, brought you to a good land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나 주께서 너희를 좋은 땅으로 인도하였다.
